discourse_list.title: Introduction to the Diamond Standard, EIP-2535 Diamonds

content.content: eip2535diamonds.substack.com    Introduction to the Diamond Standard, EIP-2535 Diamonds Back in 2018 I was implementing an ERC721 token that could own/possess/control other ERC721 tokens and ERC20 tokens. To do this I was following ERC998 Composable Non-Fungible Token Standard, which is an extension of ERC721. I had to implement ERC721...
content.GPT-summary: The post introduces the Diamond Standard, EIP-2535 Diamonds, which is an extension of ERC721. The author explains their experience implementing ERC998 and how it led to the creation of the Diamond Standard. The post does not contain any advertising or collaboration requests.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
